item.title: Indian Markets At Close: Nifty Ends Above 25,100, Posts Biggest Weekly Gain In 3 Months
item.description: Analysts flagged consolidation in Infosys, resistance in Apollo Micro, and an upside breakout in Shriram Properties.

item.title: After 9 Months Of Decline, India’s Retail Inflation Rises To 2.07% In August
item.description: Food inflation, which is a significant part of the consumer price index, came in at -0.69%, compared to -1.76% in July

item.title: What’s Sending Artista Networks’ Stock Higher In Today’s Premarket?
item.description: Barclays believed that there is potential for upside to the company’s outlook, given "broad-based momentum."

item.title: This PSU Stock Rallied 10% On Ambitious ₹2,000 Crore Capex Plan
item.description: Hindustan Copper shares have gained in eight of the last 10 sessions. An analyst highlighted a bullish reversal, with resistance seen at ₹281-286.

item.title: Why Is Asset Entities' Stock Surging Premarket?
item.description: The stock was among the top five trending tickers at the time of writing, with over 260,000 shares already changing hands.
